review_data.title: Dinner with friends
review_data.content: Great dinner: if you're really hungry, you will love the size of your plate, quick service (we were 10 people eating and were served in less than 20 Minutes) the staff is really nice and the food tasted good! Surely coming back to this place!!...More

review_data.title: More than we could eat, but way too good to waste!

review_data.title: Good surprise in Mattenhof
review_data.content: A good and unexpected surprise in Mattenhof. Good cuisine, salad was very good and they have a large choice of cordons bleus (chicken, pork and veal) all kind of filling. Well prepared and nicely served. They also have steaks and pizzas. Very friendly staff Short...More
